ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.

ayahs.text: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.

ayahs.text: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوا۟ وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَيُلْهِهِمُ ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.

ayahs.text: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.

ayahs.text: وَقَالُوا۟ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.

ayahs.text: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"

ayahs.text: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ إِذًۭا مُّنظَرِينَ
ayahs.translation: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.

ayahs.text: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
ayahs.translation: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.

ayahs.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.

ayahs.text: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.

ayahs.text: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِيهِ يَعْرُجُونَ
ayahs.translation: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,

ayahs.text: لَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ أَبْصَٰرُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌۭ مَّسْحُورُونَ
ayahs.translation: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًۭا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.

ayahs.text: وَحَفِظْنَٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]

ayahs.text: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ مَّوْزُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.

ayahs.text: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.

ayahs.text: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ فَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلْصَٰلٍۢ مِّنْ حَمَإٍۢ مَّسْنُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.

ayahs.text: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
ayahs.translation: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.

ayahs.text: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًۭا مِّن صَلْصَٰلٍۢ مِّنْ حَمَإٍۢ مَّسْنُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.translation: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

ayahs.text: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
ayahs.translation: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,

ayahs.text: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.translation: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.

ayahs.text: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"

ayahs.text: قَالَ لَمْ أَكُن لِّأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَٰلٍۢ مِّنْ حَمَإٍۢ مَّسْنُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."

ayahs.text: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."

ayahs.text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayahs.translation: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

ayahs.text: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
ayahs.translation: Until the Day of the time well-known."

ayahs.text: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

ayahs.text: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayahs.translation: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

ayahs.text: قَالَ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَىَّ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
ayahs.translation: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ عِبَادِى لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.

ayahs.text: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍۢ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌۭ مَّقْسُومٌ
ayahs.translation: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.

ayahs.text: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."

ayahs.text: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.

ayahs.text: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌۭ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ
ayahs.translation: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.

ayahs.text: ۞ نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.translation: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.

ayahs.text: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ
ayahs.translation: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.

ayahs.text: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ عَن ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
ayahs.translation: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,

ayahs.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَٰمًۭا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ
ayahs.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."

ayahs.text: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
ayahs.translation: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَٰنِطِينَ
ayahs.translation: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."

ayahs.text: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
ayahs.translation: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"

ayahs.text: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

ayahs.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,

ayahs.text: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.translation: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all

ayahs.text: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَٰبِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.

ayahs.text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,

ayahs.text: قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌۭ مُّنكَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,

ayahs.text: وَأَتَيْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَٰدِقُونَ
ayahs.translation: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.

ayahs.text: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌۭ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."

ayahs.text: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌۭ مُّصْبِحِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.

ayahs.text: وَجَآءَ أَهْلُ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And the people of the city came rejoicing.

ayahs.text: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ
ayahs.translation: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.

ayahs.text: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ
ayahs.translation: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."

ayahs.text: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"

ayahs.text: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَٰعِلِينَ
ayahs.translation: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."

ayahs.text: لَعَمْرُكَ إِنَّهُمْ لَفِى سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayahs.translation: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.

ayahs.text: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.

ayahs.text: فَجَعَلْنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةًۭ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
ayahs.translation: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَٰتٍۢ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٍۢ مُّقِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَءَايَةًۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.

ayahs.text: وَإِن كَانَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ لَظَٰلِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.

ayahs.text: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.translation: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.

ayahs.text: وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُمْ ءَايَٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.

ayahs.text: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.

ayahs.text: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ
ayahs.translation: But the shriek seized them at early morning.

ayahs.text: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayahs.translation: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.

ayahs.text: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَءَاتِيَةٌۭ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
ayahs.translation: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَٰكَ سَبْعًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
ayahs.translation: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.

ayahs.text: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers

ayahs.text: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
ayahs.translation: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -

ayahs.text: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ
ayahs.translation: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.

ayahs.text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.translation: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all

ayahs.text: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: About what they used to do.

ayahs.text: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayahs.translation: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
ayahs.translation: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.

ayahs.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
ayahs.translation: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].

ayahs.text: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ
ayahs.translation: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
